scripts.pub: npm run pre && npm publish --tag latest ./dist/ngx-collection
scripts.pub-next: npm run pre-next && npm publish --tag next ./dist/ngx-collection
scripts.pre: npm i && ng build && cp ./README.md ./dist/ngx-collection/README.md && npx jest --clearCache && npm run test && npm publish ./dist/ngx-collection --dry-run
scripts.pre-next: npm i && ng build && cp ./README.md ./dist/ngx-collection/README.md && npx jest --clearCache && npm run test && npm publish --tag next ./dist/ngx-collection --dry-run
scripts.reinst: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && npm i && npm run pre
